evidence.text: In Dockery, the plaintiffs, prisoners at East Mississippi Correctional Facility (“EMCF”), filed a class action challenging the conditions of confinement at EMCF. ... In Dockery, the plaintiffs appealed the denial of an injunction.
Fifth Circuit’s August 5, 2021 decision in Dockery v. Cain, 7 F.4th 375 (5th Cir. 2021).

extracted.value: Appeal: plaintiffs, prisoners at East Mississippi Correctional Facility (EMCF) appealed to the Fifth Circuit Court of Appeals.
